Parameters: EGL10: the EGL10 for the current display.
chooseConfig(javax.microedition.khronos..Description: Choose a configuration from the list. Implementors typically implement this method by calling @B_javax#microedition#khronos#egl#EGL10#eglChooseConfig_E@ and iterating through the results. Please consult the EGL specification available from The Khronos Group to learn how to call eglChooseConfig.
chooseConfig(javax.microedition.khronos..FullName: public abstract EGLConfig chooseConfig (EGL10 egl, EGLDisplay display)

ClassDesc: An interface for choosing an EGLConfig configuration from a list of potential configurations. This interface must be implemented by clients wishing to call @B_android#opengl#GLSurfaceView#setEGLConfigChooser_E@
